Articles.Content:
Project Meiyo is a science vessel meant for literally nothing but science, no weapons whatsoever, it has its own processing lab, efficent propulsion, and lots of fuel.

Download:http://www./view/a4stug9w8jbcfrj/Halco_Industries_-_Project_Meiyo.craft

Sorry no pics! need to make an Imgur account but can't at the moment (please dont ask why!)

If you dont have something nice to say please don't say it! this is my first deep-space worthy ship, and the first being produced by Halco Industries!

It uses parts from B9 Aerospace and stock KSP, if you have KerbPaint some parts will be painted when you download this.

Review the craft below!

Launch craft not included sorry! (I haven't even made a launch craft LOL) it's in the SPH if anyone is wondering.

Edited November 6, 2014 by Kozak
